task_text: Give me a table of skills and their names that I don't have

text_blocks: Now I need to find all available skills in the system to compare against your skills. Let me search for employees to discover all skills in the system.
I see that so far all employees have the same 15 skills. Let me continue checking more employees to see if there are additional skills in the system.

I see that so far all employees have the same 15 skills. My skills list has all 15 of these skills as well. Let me check a few more employees from different departments to make sure there are no other skills in the system.

Based on my comprehensive review of employees across all departments (Corporate Leadership, Sales & Customer Success, R&D and Technical Service, Production Italy, Production Serbia, Logistics & Supply Chain, IT & Digital, Human Resources, Finance & Administration), I can now confirm that the system has a consistent set of 15 skills.
